blogPost.excerpt: 💸 Z1 is a digital bank for teenagers in LatAm, where they can spend and receive money through a prepaid Mastercard credit card. Z1 gives teenagers autonomy and teaches them financial literacy from their first contact with money all throughout their adulthood✨
blogPost.body: 💸 Z1 is a digital bank for teenagers in LatAm, where they can spend and receive money through a prepaid Mastercard credit card. Z1 gives teenagers autonomy and teaches them financial literacy from their first contact with money all throughout their adulthood✨
blogPost.title: Z1 - Digital bank for teenagers in Latam
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 💸 Z1是拉丁美洲青少年的数字银行，他们可以通过预付万事达卡信用卡消费和收款。Z1给予青少年自主权，并教会他们从第一次接触金钱到整个成年后的金融知识✨。
localize.tagline: 拉脱维亚青少年数字银行

localize.description: 💸 Z1是拉丁美洲青少年的數字銀行，他們可以通過預付萬事達卡信用卡消費和收款。Z1給予青少年自主權，並教會他們從第一次接觸金錢到整個成年後的金融知識✨。
localize.tagline: 拉脫維亞青少年數字銀行

previous.excerpt: Salad is the easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC. Our users (or “Chefs”) turn a wealth of idle compute resources into epic loot—including Steam games, digital subscriptions, in-game loot, gift cards, and more.
previous.title: Salad - The easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC

localize.description: 沙拉是最简单、最值得信赖的从PC上获利的方式。我们的用户（或称 "厨师"）将大量的闲置计算资源转化为史诗级的战利品--包括Steam游戏、数字订阅、游戏内战利品、礼品卡等。
localize.tagline: 最简单、最值得信赖的从您的电脑中获利的方法。

localize.description: 沙拉是最簡單、最值得信賴的從PC上獲利的方式。我們的用戶（或稱 "廚師"）將大量的閒置計算資源轉化爲史詩級的戰利品--包括Steam遊戲、數字訂閱、遊戲內戰利品、禮品卡等。
localize.tagline: 最簡單、最值得信賴的從您的電腦中獲利的方法。

next.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
next.title: Hyper Online - Animoji social network for people into games and anime.

localize.description: Hyper是一款专为游戏玩家和动漫迷打造的动漫语音聊天应用。与人见面，语音聊天，不用担心露出真面目。我们给你提供绘画、语音聊天等工具。花费的时间越多，赚取的金币越多，可以获得新的角色。
localize.tagline: Animoji社交网络为人们进入游戏和动漫。

localize.description: Hyper是一款專爲遊戲玩家和動漫迷打造的動漫語音聊天應用。與人見面，語音聊天，不用擔心露出真面目。我們給你提供繪畫、語音聊天等工具。花費的時間越多，賺取的金幣越多，可以獲得新的角色。
localize.tagline: Animoji社交網絡爲人們進入遊戲和動漫。
